Text: Thanks for not using the pre-neolithic rar-archiving system!

Super torrent as usual but PLEASE don't embed the subtitles

*** ATTENTION ALL ***

The subtitles are NOT embedded... Just set your player not to display them.

Why people automatically assume its always someone elses fault Ill never know.

As always thanks for the 720 eztv!

This is a .mkv file, the subtitles (english) are included but they are NOT hardcoded.  Just deselect them in your player if you don't want to see them.

Thanks you for including the subtitles!

Don't know what you guys are doing, but there is no way to turn of the subtitles with windows media player or windows player classic. I'll try VLC later, but just thought i'd mention this. Not sure what Livens and hot_soup are using.
disregard my last statement, you can turn of the subtitles in BS player.
This file will not open with the latest version of VLC (1.1.9). Are we sure this file is good and, if so, what are you using to play it?

never fail to love the comments. works like a charm as do all your ups. no hardcoded subs.Thanks again

Downloaded it last week, very good quality upload as always. I'm hoping you'll upload episode 6 too. The subtitles are easily switched off with VLC but I just used MKVextract and MKVmerge to remove the subs completely.
